item.title: 中芯国际第四季度利润增长60.7%
item.description: 中国最大的代工芯片制造商中芯国际周二公布，其第四季度利润同比增长60.7%。【原文：China's largest contract chipmaker Semiconductor Manufacturing International Corp on Tuesday reported a 60.7% year-on-year increase in fourth-quarter profit.】

item.title: 法国葡萄酒和烈酒出口连续第三年失去活力，贸易紧张局势造成冲击
item.description: 法国葡萄酒和烈酒出口在2025年连续第三年下滑，行业组织FEVS周二表示，美国关税和中国关税损害了销售，前景依然严峻。【原文：French wine and spirits exports fell for a third consecutive year in 2025 as U.S. tariffs and duties in China hurt sales, and the outlook remains challenging, industry group FEVS said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 欧盟最高法院将WhatsApp与欧盟隐私监管机构的诉讼案发回下级法庭审理
item.description: 欧洲最高法院周二将Meta旗下WhatsApp与欧盟隐私监管机构的诉讼案发回下级法庭重审，这场持续五年的法律拉锯战源于监管机构要求爱尔兰数据保护局将罚款金额提高至2.25亿欧元（约合2.68亿美元）。【原文：Europe's top court on Tuesday sent Meta Platforms unit WhatsApp's fight against the EU privacy watchdog back to a lower tribunal, prolonging a five-year tussle triggered by the latter's order to the Irish data protection authority to jack up a fine to 225 million euro ($268 million).】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德正洽谈以12亿美元收购黑石旗下菲迪尔公司，据《Expansion》报道
item.description: 据西班牙《扩展报》周二援引匿名市场消息人士报道，布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司正与黑石集团就收购其在西班牙的住宅房地产公司Fidere进行独家谈判。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management is in exclusive talks with Blackstone to purchase its residential real estate company Fidere in Spain, Spanish newspaper Expansion reported on Tuesday, citing unidentified market sources.】

item.title: 软银财报有望因OpenAI获得提振，未来融资成为焦点
item.description: 日本软银集团预计将在周四公布季度财报时，因其对OpenAI的投资而实现可观盈利。市场正密切关注该集团将如何为其人工智能领域的疯狂投资提供资金支持。【原文：Japan's SoftBank Group is expected to post a healthy profit on its investment in OpenAI when it reports quarterly results on Thursday, as the market focuses on how it will fund its artificial intelligence spending spree.】

item.title: 人工智能驱动的科技股暴跌蔓延，外国投资者撤离亚洲股市
item.description: 2月初，亚洲股市遭遇外国资金大规模撤离。随着全球高增长科技股因人工智能相关巨额资本支出引发担忧而遭遇抛售，韩国和台湾股市承受了巨大压力。【原文：Foreign outflows from Asian stocks rose sharply in the first week of February as South Korea and Taiwan came under pressure from a global selloff in high-growth technology shares on concerns over the hefty AI-related capital spending.】

item.title: 凯雷集团将向印度雪绒花金融公司注资2.32亿美元
item.description: 印度爱德华威斯金融公司周二宣布，美国资产管理公司凯雷集团将以210亿卢比（约合2.3201亿美元）收购其子公司Nido住房金融公司45%的股权。【原文：India's Edelweiss Financial said on Tuesday U.S.- based Asset manager Carlyle will acquire a 45% stake in the company's unit Nido Home Finance for 21 billion rupees. ($232.01 million)】

item.title: 思科推出新型人工智能网络芯片，直面博通与英伟达的挑战
item.description: 思科系统公司周二推出了一款新型芯片和路由器，旨在加速海量数据中心的信息传输，该产品将与博通和英伟达的产品竞争，以分得6000亿美元人工智能基础设施支出热潮中的一杯羹。【原文：Cisco Systems on Tuesday launched a new chip and router designed to speed information through massive data centers that will compete against offerings from Broadcom and Nvidia for a piece of the $600 billion AI infrastructure spending boom.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行将首席执行官薪酬提高至逾2000万美元
item.description: 巴克莱银行将首席执行官C·S·文卡塔克里希南的薪酬包提高至2025年的1500万英镑（约合2050万美元），较前一年的1160万英镑有所增长。这家英国银行成为最新一家提高高管奖金发放额度的金融机构。【原文：Barclays hiked CEO C.S. Venkatakrishnan's pay package to 15 million pounds ($20.5 million) in 2025, up from 11.6 million pounds the year before, as the British bank became the latest lender to increase bonus payouts for top staff.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局称，捷豹路虎因火灾风险警告将在美国召回2,278辆电动SUV
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周二表示，捷豹路虎正在美国召回2,278辆I-PACE SUV，因其高压电池可能过热，增加起火风险。【原文：Jaguar Land Rover is recalling 2,278 I-PACE SUVs in the U.S. as a high voltage battery may overheat, increasing the risk of a fire, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 装瓶商可口可乐HBC公司因非酒精饮料需求强劲而利润增长
item.description: 装瓶商可口可乐HBC公司周二预测，2026年有机营业利润将实现7%-10%的增长，这得益于非酒精饮料的强劲需求以及向具有增长潜力的市场扩张。【原文：Bottler Coca-Cola HBC AG forecast 7%-10% growth in organic operating profit in 2026 on Tuesday, driven by strong demand for non-alcoholic drinks and expansion into markets with growth potential.】

item.title: 电光系统公司就Grizzly做空报告可能涉及的法律违规问题发出警示；股价收盘走高
item.description: 澳大利亚激光制造商Electro Optic Systems周二表示，该公司担忧美国做空机构Grizzly Research上周发布的一份报告可能存在违法行为，该报告导致其股价大幅下跌。【原文：Australian laser maker Electro Optic Systems said on Tuesday it was concerned U.S. short seller Grizzly Research may have acted unlawfully by publishing a report on the company last week that triggered a sharp fall in its share price.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行年度利润增长12%，宣布新目标
item.description: 巴克莱银行周二宣布，其年度利润增长12%，并公布了至2028年的新业绩目标。这家英国银行计划通过聚焦核心本土市场，并运用人工智能等技术削减成本来提升回报率。【原文：Barclays said its annual profit increased 12% and announced new performance targets out to 2028 on Tuesday, as the British bank aims to improve returns by focusing on its core home market and using technology such as AI to cut costs.】

item.title: 英国石油公司报告2025年第四季度利润符合预期
item.description: 英国石油公司周二公布的第四季度基础重置成本利润（即调整后净利润）为15.4亿美元，低于该公司对分析师调查预期的15.5亿美元，但高于去年同期的11.7亿美元。【原文：BP posted a fourth-quarter underlying replacement cost profit, or adjusted net income, of $1.54 billion on Tuesday, compared with expectations of $1.55 billion in a company-provided poll of analysts and $1.17 billion a year ago.】

item.title: 阿斯利康预计2026年将实现增长，目前正积极构建药物研发管线。
item.description: 阿斯利康周二预测2026年将实现利润和销售额增长，押注其癌症治疗药物和新药的需求，同时推进在美国和中国的业务扩张。【原文：AstraZeneca on Tuesday forecast profit and sales growth in 2026, betting on demand for its cancer treatments and newer drugs as it pushes expansion in the United States and China.】

item.title: 消息人士称，印度正与巴西、加拿大、法国、荷兰就关键矿产协议展开谈判
item.description: 消息人士称，印度正与巴西、加拿大、法国和荷兰就共同勘探、开采、加工和回收关键矿产的协议进行磋商，以扩大其全球影响力，确保关键原材料的供应。【原文：India is in talks with Brazil, Canada, France and the Netherlands over deals to jointly explore, extract, process and recycle critical minerals, sources said, as it broadens its global outreach to secure supplies of key raw materials.】

item.title: 本田季度营业利润同比下滑逾60%
item.description: 本田汽车周二表示，其第三季度营业利润下降61.4%，连续第四个季度同比下滑，原因是美国进口关税和电动汽车需求疲软拖累了业绩。【原文：Honda Motor said on Tuesday its third-quarter operating profit fell 61.4%, marking a fourth consecutive year-on-year decline, as U.S. import tariffs and weakening demand for electric vehicles weighed on results.】

item.title: 德国TeamViewer公司预计，在波动的市场环境下，2026年其营收增幅可达3%。
item.description: 德国软件开发商TeamViewer周二预测，2026年年度营收增长将在0%至3%之间，调整后核心利润（EBITDA）利润率约为43%。由于市场波动性较高，该公司对业绩指引采取了谨慎态度。【原文：German software developer TeamViewer forecast on Tuesday annual revenue growth of between 0% and 3% in 2026, with an adjusted core profit (EBITDA) margin of about 43% as high market volatility led to a cautious approach to its guidance.】

item.title: 开云集团第四季度销售额跌幅低于预期，古驰品牌持续下滑
item.description: 开云集团周二公布的第四季度销售额下滑幅度略低于预期，投资者正等待首席执行官卢卡·德梅奥重振这家古驰母公司颓势的具体计划。【原文：Kering reported on Tuesday a slightly smaller-than-expected drop in fourth-quarter sales, as investors await details of CEO Luca de Meo's plans to revive the Gucci owner's flagging fortunes.】

item.title: 英国乐购将快速配送威胁转化为竞争优势
item.description: 五年前，乐购首席执行官肯·墨菲曾警告称，快速配送初创企业可能对英国大型超市造成"千刀万剐般的致命打击"。如今，这家英国最大的食品零售商已将威胁转化为优势。【原文：Five years after Tesco boss Ken Murphy warned that rapid-delivery startups could inflict "death by a thousand nibbles" on Britain's major supermarkets, the UK's biggest food retailer has turned the threat into an advantage.】

item.title: 晨间要闻：特朗普政府准备废除气候法规
item.description: 格雷戈尔·斯图尔特·亨特带您展望欧洲及全球市场今日走势【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Gregor Stuart Hunter】

item.title: 印度阿达尼企业正与美国外国资产控制办公室进行磋商
item.description: 印度阿达尼企业周二表示，正就去年6月《华尔街日报》报道的指控与美国外国资产控制办公室进行磋商。该报道称亿万富翁高塔姆·阿达尼试图让美国总统特朗普政府撤销对其的贿赂指控。【原文：India's Adani Enterprises said on Tuesday it is talks with the U.S. Office of Foreign Assets over allegations from a Wall Street Journal report published in June last year that said billionaire Gautam Adani was trying to get the U.S. President Donald Trump administration to drop bribery charges against him.】

item.title: 澳大利亚要求与Roblox会面，此前收到诱骗及内容投诉
item.description: 澳大利亚政府已就平台上存在诱骗儿童及暴露于露骨内容的报道，召集游戏平台Roblox召开会议。与此同时，监管机构表示将核查Roblox是否履行了儿童安全承诺。【原文：The Australian government has called a meeting with gaming platform Roblox over reports of child grooming and exposure to graphic content on the platform, while a regulator said it will test whether Roblox had delivered on child-safety commitments.】

item.title: 韩国称Coupang必须在数据泄露调查中解决安全漏洞问题
item.description: 韩国当局周二表示，电商巨头Coupang需要修复其安全系统中的漏洞，这些漏洞被指是导致该公司发生大规模数据泄露的原因。【原文：South Korean authorities said on Tuesday that e-commerce giant Coupang needs to fix vulnerabilities in its security systems that they blamed for causing a massive data leak at the company.】

item.title: 渣打银行任命彼得·伯里尔为临时首席财务官
item.description: 渣打银行周二宣布任命彼得·伯里尔为临时集团首席财务官，接替迪亚戈·德乔吉的职位。德乔吉即刻离职，将另谋高就。【原文：Standard Chartered , has appointed Peter Burrill as interim group chief financial officer on Tuesday, replacing Diego De Giorgi, who steps down with immediate effect to pursue an external opportunity.】

item.title: 印度卢宾制药与安斯泰来制药达成专利协议，维持米拉贝隆在美国销售
item.description: 印度制药商卢宾周二表示，已就膀胱疾病药物米拉贝隆的专利侵权纠纷与日本安斯泰来制药达成和解，这使其得以继续在美国销售该产品。【原文：Indian drugmaker Lupin said on Tuesday it has settled a patent infringement dispute with Japan's Astellas Pharma over the bladder disorder drug Mirabegron, allowing it to continue selling the product in the United States.】

item.title: 据《商业内幕》报道，Salesforce裁员人数不足1000人
item.description: 云软件供应商Salesforce在本月初裁减了不足1000个职位，商业内幕网周一援引知情人士消息报道称。【原文：Cloud software provider Salesforce cut fewer than 1,000 roles at the beginning of this month, Business Insider reported on Monday, citing a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 油价走低，交易员权衡美伊紧张局势下的供应风险
item.description: 周二油价小幅回落，交易员们正评估供应中断的可能性。此前美国针对穿越霍尔木兹海峡船只的指导意见，使市场焦点持续集中于华盛顿与德黑兰之间的紧张关系。【原文：Oil prices eased slightly on Tuesday as traders gauged the potential for supply disruptions after U.S. guidance for vessels transiting the Strait of Hormuz kept attention squarely on tensions between Washington and Tehran.】

item.title: 美元在美数据公布前走软，日元在选举后维持涨幅
item.description: 周二美元汇率大幅下挫，因市场等待一系列将影响利率路径的经济数据公布；与此同时，在首相高市早苗赢得压倒性选举胜利后，日元汇率延续了此前涨势。【原文：The U.S. dollar nursed steep losses on Tuesday ahead of a slate of economic data that will shape the interest rate path, while the yen held on to its gains in the wake of Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi's resounding election victory.】

item.title: 亚洲股市上涨，日经指数创下新高，美元下跌
item.description: 亚洲股市周二早盘连续第二个交易日走高，东京基准股指延续涨势，此前日本首相高市早苗在上周末的选举中取得压倒性胜利。【原文：Asian stocks advanced for a second day in early trading on Tuesday, led by an extended rally in Tokyo's benchmark after Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi's decisive election victory over the weekend.】
